argument.description: A character expression representing the unqualified name (usually of an existing alias) to be resolved.
A character expression representing the unqualified name (usually of an existing alias) to be resolved.

description: The TABLE_SCHEMA function returns the schema name of the object found after any alias chains have been resolved.
sample:
SELECT NPAGES, CARD FROM SYSCAT.TABLES
     WHERE TABNAME = TABLE_NAME ('A1')
     AND TABSCHEMA = TABLE_SCHEMA ('A1')
